ingredients.item: 1 litre hot Cooks' Ingredients Vegetable Stock
2 tbsp Cooks' Ingredients Chinese Rice Vinegar
349g pack firm tofu, cut into 2cm cubes
265g pack Waitrose Spicy Chinese Vegetable Stir Fry

instructions.step: Heat the sunflower oil in a large saucepan and cook the garlic and ginger for 1–2 minutes until softened. Stir in the vegetable stock, soy sauce, rice vinegar and a pinch of ground white pepper. Bring to a boil and simmer gently for 10 minutes until slightly reduced.
Stir in the tofu and stir fry vegetables and simmer for a couple of minutes. Remove the pan from the heat, ladle into bowls and scatter with the salad onions to serve.
